body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Tattoo Express. My name is Stephen Rodriguez. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Laura Allen.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Laura. Could you provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is laura.allen@example.com and my phone number is six five zero - eight eight nine - one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Laura. How can I assist you today with Tattoo Express?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently purchased a tattoo kit from your store, but unfortunately, one of the needles was damaged. Is there a way to get a replacement?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear about the damaged needle, Laura. Let me assist you with that. Could you please provide me with the order number of your purchase?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, the order number is three two four five six eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the order number. I will arrange for a replacement needle to be sent to you. Is there anything else I can help you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all I needed help with. Thank you for your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Laura. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
